children.subject: I sent my petition to Michael Sun.

history.content:
According to the website for the 5th Year MS students, those of us who wish to serve as GSIs need to submit our petition to the 

Master's Services Adviser (see excerpt below from this link). Who is the Master's Services Adviser?

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Graduate Student Instructors (GSIs)

EECS 5th Year Bachelor/Masters (5th Yr MS) Program students may serve as GSIs during the graduate program, with the usual fee remission applied to UGGSI. 5th Yr MS students wishing to serve as GSIs must submit a petition which includes a statement from their research advisor explaining why a GSI appointment will not delay the student's graduation. These petitions should be submitted to the Master's Services Adviser. Decisions will be communicated to the petitioner and the faculty GSI Coordinators. GSI Applications will not be considered until the separate GSI petition has been approved.
history.subject: Who is the Master's Service Advisor?
